name: BackyarDEV's IPA Repo
subtitle: A source for ApolloICA App
description: This is a AltStore source for ApolloICA

versions.localizedDescription:
This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.5 patched with Liquid Glass support.

Prevent certain crashes when Reddit API goes down (#105)

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.4 patched with Liquid Glass support.

Fix certain GIFs showing up as `Processing img <id>` in comments (#102)

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.3 patched with Liquid Glass support.

- Fix inline Giphy GIFs not loading in comments (#99)

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.2 patched with Liquid Glass support.

- Update default trending subreddit source to `https://jeffreyca.github.io/subreddits/trending-subriff-blended.txt` ([source](https://github.com/JeffreyCA/subreddits?tab=readme-ov-file#trending-subriff-blendedtxt))
    - Previous source has been discontinued
- Fix certain GIFs playing at 2x speed on 120Hz displays (#97)

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.1 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Fix certain Streamable links not loading in media view (https://github.com/JeffreyCA/Apollo-ImprovedCustomApi/pull/95)

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.4.0 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Support custom redirect URIs and user agents (in Settings > General > Custom API)
	◦ This should enable certain workarounds for getting new API keys
	◦ Custom redirect URIs require patching the IPA
• Liquid Glass: fix sort options alignment in comment view

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.3.2 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Fix crashes in Custom API settings on iOS 14

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.3.1 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Restore long press gesture on account tab to open account switcher
• Fix opaque nav bar background in dark mode
• Fix dark band appearing in nav bar when scrolling
• Fix misaligned tab labels on startup

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.3.0 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Backup and restore most Apollo and tweak settings (in Settings > General > Custom API)
	◦ Settings are exported as a .zip file with 2 plist files: preferences.plist (most Apollo and tweak settings) and group.plist (filters, theme settings)
	◦ Restoring settings does not restore or affect existing account logins. This means on a clean install, accounts need to be re-added manually. The backup .zip contains an accounts.txt with all account usernames for reference.
• Update Custom API Settings layout

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.2.6 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Fix video downloads failing on certain v.redd.it videos
	◦ Context: recently, Reddit started using CMAF media format for serving video content, which Apollo does not natively support downloading for.

This version includes the ApolloICA tweak version: 1.2.5 patched with Liquid Glass support.

• Fix occassional crashes when scrolling on iOS 26 with Liquid Glass patch (thanks @dankrichtofen for the original implementation)
	◦ To apply Liquid Glass patch: see instructions or original issue
• Fix crashes when tapping share URL link buttons on iOS 26
	◦ Note that this is not a full fix. Tapping the link button now navigates to a webview on iOS 26. As a workaround, tap the inline text (see this comment).
• Fix debug logging on iOS 26
